dashboard.label: High Level
dashboard.definition: {"dataSources":{"ds_search_1_new_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest /services/authentication/users splunk_server=local | table title roles | rename title as user | rename roles as title | mvexpand title | join type=left max=0 title [| rest /services/authorization/roles splunk_server=local | table title srchInd* | eval indexes=mvappend(srchIndexesAllowed,srchIndexesDefault) | table title indexes | mvexpand indexes | dedup title indexes | eval indexes_orig=indexes | join indexes max=0 type=left [| rest /services/data/indexes | stats count by title | table title| eval indexes=if(match(title,\"^_\"),\"_*\",\"*\") | rename title as indexes_new]| eval indexes=if(indexes_orig!=indexes_new,indexes_new, indexes_orig) | table title indexes]","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1_new":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=* | stats count by host, source, sourcetype","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}},"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=\"_internal\" source=\"*metrics.log*\" group=tcpin_connections | dedup hostname| table hostname,sourceIp,fwdType,guid,version,build,os,arch","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}}}},"visualizations":{"viz_table_1_new_new":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new_new"},"title":"Index Access","description":"Shows which users have access to indexes. Check right users/groups have access to the right indexes/"},"viz_table_1_new":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1_new"},"title":"Host, Source, Sourcetype","description":"This shows Host, Source, Sourcetypes. Check the source and sourcetypes match"},"viz_table_1":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"count":20,"dataOverlayMode":"none","drilldown":"none","percentagesRow":false,"rowNumbers":false,"totalsRow":false,"wrap":true},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"All Inputs","description":"This shows a list of all inputs this search can see. fwdType {uf, full, }. Check all forwarders can be seen."}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"grid","options":{},"structure":[{"item":"viz_table_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_table_1_new","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":300,"w":1200,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_table_1_new_new","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":600,"w":1200,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"title":"High Level","description":"","defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}}}
